Package org.vfny.geoserver.services

Service implementations

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractPreferenceService Abstract class that other services extend.
GetPreference Provides a web interface for getting preferences.
SetDefault Provides a web interface for setting the default value for preferences.
SetPreference Provides a web interface for setting preferences.
 

Package org.vfny.geoserver.services Description

Service implementations

Sequence of method calls triggered by a GetPreference request

Sequence of method calls triggered by a SetPreference request
